item.title: 高管表示，OpenAI 已多次宣布 "红色条规
item.description: Sam Altman’s decision to declare a “code red” at OpenAI earlier this month may have caught the industry’s attention, but it wasn’t a first for the artificial intelligence company.

item.title: 客户强烈抗议后，LG 将允许电视机用户删除微软 Copilot 系统
item.description: 在消费者的强烈反对下，LG 电子公司将允许其电视机用户删除微软公司的人工智能软件。【原文：LG Electronics Inc. will let owners of its televisions delete Microsoft Corp.’s artificial intelligence software amid a consumer backlash.】

item.title: 摩根大通和 GoldenTree 为布鲁克林开发项目贷款 5.25 亿美元
item.description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. and GoldenTree Asset Management financed a $525 million construction loan for a development along the Williamsburg waterfront in Brooklyn.

item.title: 美国开发金融机构在扩张中瞄准人工智能和矿产
item.description: A US development-finance agency that’s on track for a tripling in funding aims to invest in data centers for artificial intelligence, as well as critical minerals and energy, according to a top official.

item.title: Trump Praises Waller and Bowman, Says Fed Pick Coming in Weeks
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他正在面试 "三到四位 "美联储主席候选人，并预计将很快决定提名谁来接替杰罗姆-鲍威尔。【原文：President Donald Trump said he was interviewing “three or four” candidates for Federal Reserve chair and expected to have a decision pretty quickly on who he would nominate to replace Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 顽皮狗工作室为《星际迷航》勒令员工加班
item.description:
索尼旗下的游戏开发商一直在争分夺秒地赶在 12 月的最后期限之前完成任务 

。【原文：

The Sony-owned gamemakers have been racing to hit a December deadline 

】

item.title: Nexi 拒绝 TPG 对数字银行部门的 10 亿欧元收购要约
item.description: 意大利数字支付公司 Nexi SpA 拒绝了 TPG 对其数字银行解决方案部门的收购要约，这标志着该公司又一次失败的出售尝试。【原文：Italy’s digital payment company Nexi SpA rejected an offer by TPG for its digital banking solutions unit, marking a new failed attempt to sell it.】

item.title: 甲骨文和 OpenAI 获密歇根州批准为新数据中心供电
item.description: Michigan regulators unanimously approved a request from utility DTE Energy Co. to power a massive data center development planned by Oracle and OpenAI following a contentious hearing.

item.title: Instacart 在联邦贸易委员会消费者保护案中支付 6000 万美元
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会表示，食品杂货配送公司Instacart将支付6000万美元，以退还那些受骗注册该公司订阅服务Instacart+的消费者。【原文：Grocery delivery firm Instacart will pay $60 million to refund consumers who were deceived into enrolling in the company’s subscription service, Instacart+, the US Federal Trade Commission said.】

item.title: 即使通胀加速，墨西哥仍削减四分之一个百分点
item.description: 墨西哥中央银行将基准利率下调了四分之一个百分点，这是一系列降息措施中的最新一次，旨在刺激经济增长，尽管人们对顽固的通货膨胀忧心忡忡。【原文：Mexico’s central bank lowered its benchmark interest rate by a quarter point, the latest in a series of cuts aimed at sparking economic growth despite worries over stubborn inflation.】

item.title: 针对野火的巨灾债券失去 "不可触碰 "的地位
item.description: 另类投资经理们开始对与野火相关的巨灾债券产生浓厚兴趣，开始涉足这个几年前还被认为难以建模的风险类别。【原文：Alternative investment managers are starting to take a serious interest in catastrophe bonds tied to wildfires, moving into a risk category that just a few years ago was seen as too difficult to model.】

item.title: AllianceBernstein 称，美联储降息后，债券市场将收获现金
item.description: AllianceBernstein 的 Matthew Norton 表示，随着美联储降息导致投资者寻找新的现金存放地，市政债券可能会吸引资金，他指出为经济适用房项目出售的债务是一个有吸引力的领域。【原文：Municipal bonds are likely to lure money as Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts lead investors to look for new places to park their cash, says Matthew Norton at AllianceBernstein, and he pointed to debt sold for affordable-housing projects as an appealing sector.】

item.title: 瑞士奶酪 "CPI 报告引发对美国通胀数据的疑虑
item.description: 在期待已久的政府数据显示 11 月份美国基本通胀率降至四年低点后，经济学家们至少达成了这样的共识：有些不对劲。【原文：After long-awaited government data showed underlying US inflation cooled to a four-year low in November, economists agreed on at least this much: something was off.】

item.title: 花旗银行因风险与合规问题摆脱监管机构 2024 年的处罚
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：An amendment to a Citigroup Inc. regulatory penalty was removed in a sign the bank is closer to completing its longstanding tasks to improve risk and compliance.】

item.title: 液化天然气开发商 Delfin 的筹资工作将延至明年
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在路易斯安那州沿海开发价值 43 亿美元的液化天然气出口项目的开发商 Delfin Midstream Inc.【原文：Delfin Midstream Inc., the developer of a $4.3 billion liquefied natural gas export project off the coast of Louisiana, won’t complete its planned fundraising until next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 就业市场降温，工资上涨令英国央行保持谨慎
item.description: 英国的就业市场正朝着两个方向发展：失业率在上升，但工资增长却几乎没有放缓。这种尴尬的局面在很大程度上解释了为什么英国央行在周四降息时采取了鹰派基调。【原文：Britain’s jobs market is pulling in two directions: unemployment is rising, yet wage growth is barely slowing at all. This awkward situation goes a long way to explaining why the Bank of England struck a hawkish tone as it cut rates on Thursday.】

item.title: 卢拉与梅洛尼通话后，欧盟与南方共同市场达成一月协议的希望大增
item.description: 在巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦与意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼通电话后，欧盟与南方共同市场之间的贸易协定将于 1 月签署的可能性似乎略有提高。【原文：Odds that the trade deal between the European Union and Mercosur will be signed in January appeared to improve slightly after a call between Brazil’s Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva and Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni.】

item.title: 微软、谷歌等 24 家公司加入美国人工智能 "创世任务
item.description: 二十多家顶级人工智能公司已签约加入联邦政府的 "创世纪使命"，这是特朗普政府为促进新兴技术在科学发现和能源项目中的应用而做出的努力。【原文：Two dozen top artificial intelligence companies have signed on to join the federal government’s “Genesis Mission,” an effort by the Trump administration to boost the use of the emerging technology for scientific discovery and energy projects.】

item.title: 人工智能氛围的又一次重大转变
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 部长称意大利并未影响 Paschi 对 Mediobanca 的竞购
item.description: 意大利财政部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）表示，意大利没有对锡耶纳蒙地帕斯基银行（Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA）收购规模较小的竞争对手梅迪班卡银行（Mediobanca SpA）施加不当影响。【原文：Italy didn’t exert undue influence over the Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA takeover of smaller rival Mediobanca SpA, Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟报价低于 Netflix，竞购战希望破灭
item.description: 交易商们打赌，华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司的潜在竞购战正在变成一场单匹马竞赛，Netflix 公司将战胜派拉蒙 Skydance 公司。【原文：Traders are betting that what once looked like a potential bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. is turning into a one horse race, with Netflix Inc. winning out over Paramount Skydance Corp.】

item.title: 雪佛龙继续在委内瑞拉紧张局势下装载油轮
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普指责委内瑞拉利用石油收益资助贩毒和恐怖主义一天之后，石油巨头雪佛龙公司正准备从委内瑞拉出口 100 万桶原油。【原文：Oil major Chevron Corp. is preparing to export 1 million barrels of crude from Venezuela, a day after President Donald Trump accused the nation of using oil proceeds to finance drug trafficking and terrorism.】

item.title: 雷诺因现金流恢复而重获投资级评级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司将雷诺汽车公司（Renault SA）的评级提升至投资级，理由是该公司预计，即使在欧洲汽车行业面临挑战的情况下，这家法国制造商仍能保持复苏。【原文：S&P Global Ratings upgraded Renault SA to investment grade, citing its expectation that the French manufacturer can sustain its recovery even in the midst of challenges for the European car sector.】

item.title: 230 亿美元期权到期前比特币波动性上升
item.description: 期权显示，比特币将在2025年的最后几周面临巨大压力，约230亿美元的合约将于下周五到期，有可能放大已经升高的波动率。【原文：Options are showing that Bitcoin is heading into the final weeks of 2025 under intense pressure, with around $23 billion in contracts set to expire next Friday that threaten to amplify already-elevated volatility.】

item.title: 据说纽约证券交易所的所有者正在洽谈投资加密货币公司 MoonPay
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，纽约证券交易所的所有者洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange Inc.【原文：Intercontinental Exchange Inc., owner of the New York Stock Exchange, is in talks to invest in crypto payments firm MoonPay Inc. as part of a funding round, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 阿根廷马尔贝克葡萄酒的摇篮正在为铜矿开采升温
item.description: 在阿根廷一个以酿酒闻名的省份，一家由瑞士支持的风险投资公司正寻求建立第一个大型铜矿，该公司正在考虑融资方案，这是新兴行业的一个关键测试案例。【原文：A Swiss-backed venture seeking to build the first large copper mine in an Argentine province better known for winemaking is considering financing offers in a key test case for the fledgling industry.】

item.title: 学龄前儿童编码公司在 Covid 蓬勃发展后申请破产
item.description: 一家帮助三岁儿童学习编码的教育公司申请破产，原因是其扩张战略超出了盈利能力。【原文：An education company that helps children as young as three learn to code filed for bankruptcy, blaming an expansion strategy that outpaced its ability to turn a profit.】

item.title: 乌克兰同意将国内生产总值认股权证转换为债权国债券
item.description: 乌克兰已与认股权证持有人达成协议，将与经济增长挂钩的证券转换为债券，推动重组，以帮助支撑其饱受战争蹂躏的财政。【原文：Ukraine has agreed with the holders of its warrants to convert the economic growth-linked securities into bonds, pushing through a restructuring to help shore up its war-torn finances.】

item.title: Blackstone 通过 CMBS 债务交易为仓库房地产投资信托基金收购提供资金
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 已完成与一系列英国仓库相关的债务交易，为其最近对 Warehouse REIT Plc 的收购提供资金。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has completed a debt deal tied to a string of British warehouses to fund its recent buyout of Warehouse REIT Plc, according to a person familiar with the matter.】
